name: SeasonFacts
0:
”Alexa open season facts”
”Alexa ask season facts for a fact”
”Alexa tell season facts to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: season facts
des:
Ask for Season Facts, and get to know some cool trivia.

Season Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Season Facts" or "Alexa, open Season Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
